titlestmt.author: Chinh Doan

titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Houston Heights Abstracts of Title

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries

did.abstract: Houston Heights is situated northwest of downtown Houston, Texas. This Collection contains records from the Houston Abstract Company, the Houston Title Guaranty Company, the Stewart Title Company, and the Southern Abstract and Title Company.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use:
userestrict.p: Special Collections owns the physical items in our collections, but copyright normally belongs to the creator of the materials or their heirs. The researcher has full responsibility for determining copyright status, obtaining permission to publish from copyright holders, and abiding by current copyright laws when publishing or displaying copies of Special Collections material in print or electronic form. For more information, consult the appropriate librarian. Reproduction decisions will be made by Special Collections staff on a case-by-case basis.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Information of acquisition method not available.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: Houston Heights Abstract of Title, Courtesy of Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries. To cite a specific item from this collection, please consult the most recent edition of your style manual for the proper formatting.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of Materials:
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged chronologically by the date the property was registered with the state office of the Clerk of the County Court of Harris County, Texas.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Houston Heights is situated northwest of downtown Houston, Texas. This Collection contains records from the Houston Abstract Company, the Houston Title Guaranty Company, the Stewart Title Company, and the Southern Abstract and Title Company. This collection consists of 10 abstracts of title and deed for the property in the Heights district, in the city of Houston and Harris County, filed from 1896 to 1941.

1930 November 3. Calogero Marsalisi, Lucia Marsalisi, City of Houston - Lots 19-22, Block 240, Houston Heights
1931 May 21. Ethel Alice Reuter, William Reuter, S.J. Humphry, Syble K. Humphry, City of Houston - Lots 1-2, Houston Heights
1935 December 3. Ethel Alice Reuter, William Reuter, John G. MacGregor, Geo F. Kmiecik, Sallie Kmiecik, City of Houston - Lots 1-2, Block 205, Houston Heights
1936 June 19. John G. MacGregor, F.E. Clark, Mabel A. MacGregor, Wallace C. MacGegor, City of Houston - Lot 1-2, Block 205,Houston Heights
1941 November 17. Calogero Marsalisi, Lucia Marsalisi, City of Houston - Lots 19-22, Block 240, Houston Heights
